extendedInfo.description: The most powerful multitrack audio recorder on Android packed with features like non-linear non-destructive editing with unlimited undo/redo, mixing, real-time effects, automation and much more!Note that this is a TRIAL version of the full paid version and of course does not include saving of projects!Now includes support for USB audio interfaces! (Full version requires USB Audio Recorder PRO)Please read the instructions carefully here: http://www.audio-evolution.com/manual/doku.php?id=usbaudiosupportYou need to have purchased and installed USB Audio Recorder PRO 1.2.1 or higher in order to use USB audio interfaces with Audio Evolution Mobile in the full version!Features:â¢ Multitrack audio playbackâ¢ Audio recording (while playing back other tracks)â¢ Loop playbackâ¢ Volume/pan/mute automationâ¢ Latency correctionâ¢ Import of WAV, AIFF, FLAC, Ogg/Vorbis audio filesâ¢ Import of mp3 (requires an optional download due to patents on mp3 if applicable to your country)â¢ Import of m4a, 3gpp, amr and other audio formats that Android supports if you are running Android 4.1 Jelly Bean or higherâ¢ Mastering to stereo WAV, AIFF, FLAC or OGG file (in full version)â¢ Sample rate conversionâ¢ Metronomeâ¢ Zoom down to the sampleâ¢ Each track has controls for volume, panning, mute, solo, arm, 3-band EQ with mid-sweep, 3 insert effects and output bus selectionâ¢ Unlimited number of tracks (*)â¢ Unlimited number of groups (*)â¢ Real-time effects include: chorus, compressor, delay, dual delay, reverse delay, reverb, bandpass, highpass, lowpass, flanger, noisegate and tremolo (*)â¢ Offline effects: fade in/out, normalize, reverse, pitch shift, time stretchingâ¢ Non-linear non-destructive editing with move, trim, split, cut/copy/paste, remove, range editingâ¢ Unlimited undo/redo for editing facilitiesâ¢ Several grid options for aligning your samples (with tempo and time signature settings)â¢ Repeat samples with several options to create loopsâ¢ Load/Save projects including loading projects from our desktop DAW Audio Evolution 5â¢ Can use ES File Explorer to select samples for import(*) Depending on your hardware's capabilitiesRequirements:â¢ 800x480 screen size or higherâ¢ Android 2.2 or higherNote: this app can only run in landscape. Trying to run it with apps like Ultimate Rotation Control can result in crashes. Turn off forced rotation for this app.Demo limitations:â¢ No loading, saving or mastering of projectsâ¢ Recording and playback stops after 2 minutesIf you like it, please buy the full version here on Google Play: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.extreamsd.aemobileIf you have any suggestions, questions or want to report a bug, please contact us by email! If you write a negative review, that's fine, but please have the decency to contact us so we can actually solve your problem!For loop packs, see 'More from developer'Twitter: http://twitter.com/#!/AudioEvolution5Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AudioEvolutionMobileOnline manual: http://www.audio-evolution.com/manual/doku.php?id=startTo prevent your device's mic from picking up what the speaker is playing back, we recommend using either:*  a USB audio interface (USB Audio Recorder PRO required as license) or*  an iRig MIC Cast: http://www.ikmultimedia.com/products/irigmiccast. The iRig is of better quality and playback is done through its headphone output. Note that hardware monitoring is not possible and you won't hear what you are recording through the headphone.Please see our extensive topic on latency in the online manual: http://www.audio-evolution.com/manual/doku.phpTags: audio recording, audio recorder, multitrack, j4t, DAW, iRig, fourtrack, fourtracks, audio editing, audio mixing, audio mixer, mix, cubase, cubasis, audio editor, fl studio, audacity, sound, pro audio, usb audio, multitrack audio, usb audio recorder, zquence

I am new to this whole recording thing and would like to know how it works. Please make this quick. I am very anxious to try this studio thing out. Thanks so much and sorry this comment was so long. lol. I am sure this app is great! :)
